snippet: The Toronto Blue Jays banned the sale of canned beer in the upper deck at Rogers Centre for the American League Championship Series after fans threw them on the field Wednesday.
abstract: Toronto Blue Jays ban sale of canned beer in Rogers Centre upper decks due to fans throwing cans on field; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays banned the sale of canned beer in the upper deck at Rogers Centre for the American League Championship Series after fans threw them on the field Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Blue Jays Limit Beer Sales
